description: Returns the configuration of all optimizers associated with a specified table.

parameters.name: CatalogId
parameters.description: The Catalog ID of the table.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: The name of the database in the catalog in which the table resides.

nested_items.name: CatalogId
nested_items.description: The Catalog ID of the table.

nested_items.name: DatabaseName
nested_items.description: The name of the database in the catalog in which the table resides.

nested_items.name: TableName
nested_items.description: The name of the table.

nested_items.name: TableOptimizer
nested_items.description: The optimizer associated with the specified table.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of table optimizer. The valid values are:
compaction: for managing compaction with a table optimizer.
retention: for managing the retention of snapshot with a table optimizer.
orphan_file_deletion: for managing the deletion of orphan files with a table optimizer.

nested_items.name: configuration
nested_items.description: A TableOptimizerConfiguration object that was specified when creating or updating a table optimizer.

nested_items.name: roleArn
nested_items.description: A role passed by the caller which gives the service permission to update the resources associated with the optimizer on the caller's behalf.

nested_items.name: enabled
nested_items.description: Whether table optimization is enabled.

nested_items.name: vpcConfiguration
nested_items.description: A TableOptimizerVpcConfiguration object representing the VPC configuration for a table optimizer.

nested_items.name: glueConnectionName
nested_items.description: The name of the Glue connection used for the VPC for the table optimizer.

nested_items.name: retentionConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration for a snapshot retention optimizer.

nested_items.name: icebergConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration for an Iceberg snapshot retention optimizer.

nested_items.name: snapshotRetentionPeriodInDays
nested_items.description: The number of days to retain the Iceberg snapshots. If an input is not provided, the corresponding Iceberg table configuration field will be used or if not present, the default value 5 will be used.

nested_items.name: numberOfSnapshotsToRetain
nested_items.description: The number of Iceberg snapshots to retain within the retention period. If an input is not provided, the corresponding Iceberg table configuration field will be used or if not present, the default value 1 will be used.

nested_items.name: cleanExpiredFiles
nested_items.description: If set to false, snapshots are only deleted from table metadata, and the underlying data and metadata files are not deleted.

nested_items.name: orphanFileDeletionConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration for an orphan file deletion optimizer.

nested_items.name: icebergConfiguration
nested_items.description: The configuration for an Iceberg orphan file deletion optimizer.

nested_items.name: orphanFileRetentionPeriodInDays
nested_items.description: The number of days that orphan files should be retained before file deletion. If an input is not provided, the default value 3 will be used.

nested_items.name: location
nested_items.description: Specifies a directory in which to look for files (defaults to the table's location). You may choose a sub-directory rather than the top-level table location.

nested_items.name: eventType
nested_items.description: An event type representing the status of the table optimizer run.

nested_items.name: startTimestamp
nested_items.description: Represents the epoch timestamp at which the compaction job was started within Lake Formation.

nested_items.name: endTimestamp
nested_items.description: Represents the epoch timestamp at which the compaction job ended.

nested_items.name: NumberOfBytesCompacted
nested_items.description: The number of bytes removed by the compaction job run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfFilesCompacted
nested_items.description: The number of files removed by the compaction job run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfDpus
nested_items.description: The number of DPUs consumed by the job, rounded up to the nearest whole number.

nested_items.name: JobDurationInHour
nested_items.description: The duration of the job in hours.

nested_items.name: error
nested_items.description: An error that occured during the optimizer run.

nested_items.name: compactionMetrics
nested_items.description: A CompactionMetrics object containing metrics for the optimizer run.

nested_items.name: IcebergMetrics
nested_items.description: A structure containing the Iceberg compaction metrics for the optimizer run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfBytesCompacted
nested_items.description: The number of bytes removed by the compaction job run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfFilesCompacted
nested_items.description: The number of files removed by the compaction job run.

nested_items.name: DpuHours
nested_items.description: The number of DPU hours consumed by the job.

nested_items.name: NumberOfDpus
nested_items.description: The number of DPUs consumed by the job, rounded up to the nearest whole number.

nested_items.name: JobDurationInHour
nested_items.description: The duration of the job in hours.

nested_items.name: retentionMetrics
nested_items.description: A RetentionMetrics object containing metrics for the optimizer run.

nested_items.name: IcebergMetrics
nested_items.description: A structure containing the Iceberg retention metrics for the optimizer run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfDataFilesDeleted
nested_items.description: The number of data files deleted by the retention job run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfManifestFilesDeleted
nested_items.description: The number of manifest files deleted by the retention job run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfManifestListsDeleted
nested_items.description: The number of manifest lists deleted by the retention job run.

nested_items.name: DpuHours
nested_items.description: The number of DPU hours consumed by the job.

nested_items.name: NumberOfDpus
nested_items.description: The number of DPUs consumed by the job, rounded up to the nearest whole number.

nested_items.name: JobDurationInHour
nested_items.description: The duration of the job in hours.

nested_items.name: orphanFileDeletionMetrics
nested_items.description: An OrphanFileDeletionMetrics object containing metrics for the optimizer run.

nested_items.name: IcebergMetrics
nested_items.description: A structure containing the Iceberg orphan file deletion metrics for the optimizer run.

nested_items.name: NumberOfOrphanFilesDeleted
nested_items.description: The number of orphan files deleted by the orphan file deletion job run.

nested_items.name: DpuHours
nested_items.description: The number of DPU hours consumed by the job.

nested_items.name: NumberOfDpus
nested_items.description: The number of DPUs consumed by the job, rounded up to the nearest whole number.

nested_items.name: JobDurationInHour
nested_items.description: The duration of the job in hours.
